rubimod:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
rubimod:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

rubimod:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
rubimod:LashOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! rubimod:Necrotic damage.

rubimod:Ruination.NAME: Ruination
rubimod:Ruination.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! rubimod:Necrotic damage.

rubimod:Punish.NAME: Punish
rubimod:Punish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! rubimod:Necrotic damage. NL Apply !rubimod:Sin! rubimod:Sin. NL Exhaust

rubimod:HeroicPlay.NAME: Heroic Play
rubimod:HeroicPlay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Frail and !M! Vulnerable.

rubimod:Penitent.NAME: Penitent
rubimod:Penitent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x !M! damage. NL Gain and apply 1 Strength.

rubimod:HydraFlail.NAME: Hydra Flail
rubimod:HydraFlail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy NL 2X times.

rubimod:Endure.NAME: Endure
rubimod:Endure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! x !M! Block. NL Gain Frail.

rubimod:SkillBookRed.NAME: Red Skill Book
rubimod:SkillBookRed.DESCRIPTION: Create a random red common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:SkillBookRed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded red common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:SkillBookGreen.NAME: Green Skill Book
rubimod:SkillBookGreen.DESCRIPTION: Create a random green common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:SkillBookGreen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded green common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:SkillBookBlue.NAME: Blue Skill Book
rubimod:SkillBookBlue.DESCRIPTION: Create a random blue common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:SkillBookBlue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded blue common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:SkillBookPurple.NAME: Purple Skill Book
rubimod:SkillBookPurple.DESCRIPTION: Create a random purple common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:SkillBookPurple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded purple common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:SkillBookColorless.NAME: Colorless Skill Book
rubimod:SkillBookColorless.DESCRIPTION: Create a random colorless uncommon skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:SkillBookColorless.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded colorless uncommon skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:SkillBookTemplate.NAME: Skill Book
rubimod:SkillBookTemplate.DESCRIPTION: Create a random ? common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:SkillBookTemplate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded ? common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:PathofShadows.NAME: Path of Shadows
rubimod:PathofShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!x2 Block. NL Gain no more Block from cards this turn. NL Keep your Block at the start of next turn.

rubimod:Meditation.NAME: Meditation
rubimod:Meditation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain Frail and draw a card.

rubimod:WayoftheSnake.NAME: Way of the Snake
rubimod:WayoftheSnake.DESCRIPTION: Start each turn with a Punish in hand.
rubimod:WayoftheSnake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Start each turn with a Punish in hand.

rubimod:Deliverance.NAME: Deliverance
rubimod:Deliverance.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, !M! rubimod:Necrotic damage and apply !rubimod:Sin! rubimod:Sin. Increase both by !rubimod:Increase! on retain.

rubimod:InexorableDoom.NAME: Inexorable Doom
rubimod:InexorableDoom.DESCRIPTION: Apply !rubimod:Doom! rubimod:Doom. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile if it has !M! cards.

rubimod:Feint.NAME: Feint
rubimod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the target is attacking, apply !M! rubimod:Sin.

rubimod:FeastofAbsolution.NAME: Absolution
rubimod:FeastofAbsolution.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! and gain [E]. NL Cleanse all of the target's debuffs. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:FeastofAbsolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M!. Cleanse all of the target's debuffs and heal the half the amount. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:HegemonsMercy.NAME: Hegemon's Mercy
rubimod:HegemonsMercy.DESCRIPTION: Cleanse all of the target's debuffs and reduce their strength by the same amount. NL Only half is permanent. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
rubimod:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is attacking, create 2 *Punish
rubimod:Riposte.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is attacking, create 2 *Punish+

rubimod:Punition.NAME: Punition
rubimod:Punition.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! rubimod:Sin. Deal rubimod:Necrotic damage equal to the target's rubimod:Sin. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:PhoenixForm.NAME: Phoenix Form
rubimod:PhoenixForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Increase your buffs by an amount that increases each turn.

rubimod:HegemonyCard.NAME: Hegemony
rubimod:HegemonyCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! rubimod:Sin back.
rubimod:HegemonyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! rubimod:Sin back.

rubimod:DarkGuardian.NAME: Dark Guardian
rubimod:DarkGuardian.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you would lose Artifact, gain !M! Regen.
rubimod:DarkGuardian.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever you would lose Artifact, gain !M! Regen.

rubimod:SinEaterCard.NAME: Sin Eater
rubimod:SinEaterCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose Artifact, gain !M! Block.

rubimod:LessonLearned.NAME: Lesson Learned
rubimod:LessonLearned.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card in combat, reduce its cost by 1.

rubimod:RelentlessStudy.NAME: Relentless Study
rubimod:RelentlessStudy.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random single-use uncommon skill in your hand each turn.

rubimod:LeechBite.NAME: Leech Bite
rubimod:LeechBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Inflict rubimod:Bleeding and rubimod:Leech_Toxin.

rubimod:SpiritCoin.NAME: Spirit Coin
rubimod:SpiritCoin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Inflict rubimod:Bleeding and rubimod:Leech_Toxin.

rubimod:LeechHose.NAME: Leech Hose
rubimod:LeechHose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage to ALL enemies and apply rubimod:Bleed and Vulnerable for X turns.
rubimod:LeechHose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage to ALL enemies and apply rubimod:Bleed and Vulnerable for X turns. NL If this is the first card you play, reduce their strength by X.

rubimod:Sacrifice.NAME: Ritual Sacrifice
rubimod:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: You can no longer heal. NL !M! Strength.
rubimod:Sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You can no longer heal. NL !M! Strength and 1 Ritual.

rubimod:StoriedDagger.NAME: Storied Dagger
rubimod:StoriedDagger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! rubimod:Necrotoxin with each attack this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

rubimod:SuitUp.NAME: Suit Up!
rubimod:SuitUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an unblocked attack deals damage, apply !M! rubimod:Necrotoxin.

rubimod:Stall.NAME: Stall
rubimod:Stall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength while Stalling.

rubimod:Stalling.NAME: Stalling
rubimod:Stalling.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply 2 regen on hit. NL On exhaust, reduce strength by !rubimod:Strength!.

rubimod:TacticalMap.NAME: Tactical Map
rubimod:TacticalMap.DESCRIPTION: On exhausting a card, draw and then discard !M! card.
rubimod:TacticalMap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL On exhausting a card, draw and then discard !M! card.

rubimod:Vaccine.NAME: Vaccine
rubimod:Vaccine.DESCRIPTION: On gaining a debuff, gain !M! Artifact.

rubimod:LikeBlood.NAME: Like Blood
rubimod:LikeBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have Artifact, gain !M! Block.

rubimod:DoomsHarbinger.NAME: Doom's Harbinger
rubimod:DoomsHarbinger.DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 rubimod:Necrotoxin. Target's debuffs are transferred on death. NL Exhaust.
rubimod:DoomsHarbinger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 rubimod:Necrotoxin. Target's debuffs are transferred on death.

rubimod:Anticipation.NAME: Anticipation
rubimod:Anticipation.DESCRIPTION: Lose !rubimod:Tax! temporary HP. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E], draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:FeastofBlood.NAME: Feast of Blood
rubimod:FeastofBlood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! rubimod:Leech_Toxin. NL If the target is rubimod:Bleeding, remove it and gain !rubimod:Regen! Regen.

rubimod:Hemorrhage.NAME: Hemorrhage
rubimod:Hemorrhage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply rubimod:Bleeding and rubimod:Leech_Toxin. Draw 1 card.

rubimod:BloodHarvest.NAME: Blood Harvest
rubimod:BloodHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

rubimod:Verdict.NAME: Verdict
rubimod:Verdict.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M!% of target's lost health.

rubimod:Vector.NAME: Vector
rubimod:Vector.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! rubimod:Leech_Toxin and heal target by 1. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

rubimod:PlagueBearer.NAME: Plague Bearer
rubimod:PlagueBearer.DESCRIPTION: After each turn, shuffle a Vector into the draw pile.
rubimod:PlagueBearer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After each turn, shuffle 2 Vectors into the draw pile.
